title: 7th BRICS summit
text:
The 7th BRICS summit was the seventh <a href="BRICS%23Summits">annual diplomatic summit</a> of the <a href="head%20of%20state">head of state</a>s or <a href="government">government</a> of the <a href="BRICS">BRICS</a> member <a href="sovereign%20state">states</a>. It was held in the <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="city">city</a> of <a href="Ufa">Ufa</a> in <a href="Bashkortostan">Bashkortostan</a> on 8–9 July 2015.
Background.
During the <a href="6th%20BRICS%20summit">6th BRICS summit</a> in <a href="Fortaleza">Fortaleza</a>, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, the <a href="BRICS">BRICS</a> leaders signed a declaration reading: "<a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, <a href="India">India</a>, <a href="China">China</a> and <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a> convey their appreciation to <a href="Russia">Russia</a> for its offer to host the Seventh <a href="BRICS">BRICS</a> Summit in 2015 in the <a href="city">city</a> of <a href="Ufa">Ufa</a> and extend their full support to that end."
Agenda.
The summit coincided with the entry into force of constituting agreements of the <a href="New%20Development%20Bank">New Development Bank</a> and the <a href="BRICS%20Contingent%20Reserve%20Arrangement">BRICS Contingent Reserve Arrangement</a> and during the summit inaugural meetings of the NDB were held, and it was announced it would be lending in local currency; and open up membership to non-BRICS countries in the coming months.
BRICS-SCO-EEU summit.
The BRICS held a joint summit with the <a href="Shanghai%20Cooperation%20Organisation">Shanghai Cooperation Organisation</a> and the <a href="Eurasian%20Economic%20Union">Eurasian Economic Union</a> in <a href="Ufa">Ufa</a> on 9 July.
